    • setPlayerTurn

      public void setPlayerTurn(int i) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Sets the index of the Player whose turn it is and sets his status to MY_TURN. Also sets the statuses of other Players to NOT_MY_TURN
      Parameters:
      i - the index of the Player whose turn it is
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the Player at that index doesn't exist

      public int getNumberOfPlayers()

    • initPlayingDecks

      public void initPlayingDecks() throws FileNotFoundException
      Initializer Method for all PlayingDecks Creates and fills the 4 Decks, one for each type of Card. Fills 3 PlayingDecks: one for Resource Cards, one for Gold Cards and one for Objective Cards. Every PlayingDeck contains a Deck and two cards placed in Slot1 and Slot2, showing their Front Side. Those 2 Cards are already drawn and positioned into their Slots. Starter Cards are contained in StarterDeck, they don't have a PlayingDeck.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException

    • getChat

      public Chat getChat()
      Getter Method for the Chat
      Returns:
      the Chat

    • putDown

      public void putDown(PlayingDeck playingDeck, int slot)
      Puts a Card from the top of the Deck of the PlayingDeck in the specified slot. If the Deck is empty, puts a Card from the top of the Deck of the other PlayingDeck in the specified slot.
      Parameters:
      playingDeck - : the PlayingDeck associated to the slot where the Card will be put
      slot - : the slot where the Card will be put
